description:
Do you want to see the world? Have you always dreamed of traveling, but felt you couldn't afford it? Well in Travel Hacking 101 I am going to teach you real world ways to travel more, travel cheaper, and even FREE!! I will also add announcements frequently with up to date travel hacking opportunities and travel deals!

At the end of this course you will:

  1. Earn enough miles for a free roundtrip flight!
  2. Know how to recognize great deals and act on them!
  3. Be location independent, travel the world and make money.
  4. Learn how to earn free one way tickets!
  5. And much much more!!!

Travel Hacking 101 will teach you everything you need to know to become a travel hacker. You will learn the tricks and hacks used to get free airline tickets, upgrades and other amazing benefits!!
title: Travel Hacking for Beginners: Travel more Spend less
